Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
EEP! That tickles, Mr. Fox! Heh... Aren't you a
mischievous one!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, hello, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? I'm playing with Mr. Fox and his friend
right now.
<PAGE>
I was taking a walk, minding my own business
when suddenly, he pounced upon me! He really
wanted to play.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I know! Would you like to play with us too,
<MYNAME>?
You bet!
Sorry, I'm busy.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! Thank you, <MYNAME>! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you hear that, Mr. Fox? <MYNAME> is going
to play with us too! Isn't that great?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Eep!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Owwwwww...wwwwwaitaminute. That didn't
hurt at all.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Geh! I'm so sorry, <MYNAME>! Are you all
right?!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Phew. I'm so relieved!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Mr. Fox, I know you're happy to play, but you
could've really hurt us, you know. It isn't nice to
play so hard!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As long as you understand, though, all is
forgiven. You're both feeling fine, I hope?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Good, good. Okay, now let's all play! But be
careful. Let's not get too rough! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
My, my! I warned you that playing too hard isn't
nice. Silly foxes!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. It looks like Mr. Fox and his friend have had
enough playing for one day.
<PAGE>
Nice work, <MYNAME>. Though I suppose it's
no surprise a farmer would know just how to
behave around animals.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, my foxy friends, that's enough for
today. So long!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for playing with us today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Mr. Fox and his friend had a really good time,
and it's all on account of your generous spirit!
<PAGE>
If you have a chance, you should come play
with them again sometime.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, that's too bad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, well! Maybe next time, then.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, what should we play next, Mr. Fox? The
day is still young, after all! ♪
